item.description: For more than 20 years the Boston Beanstalks have gathered on the first Friday night of the month at the Riverbend Lounge (formerly the Windjammer) at the Newton Marriott. This is the biggest regularly scheduled event on our calendar. It's not uncommon to see 40 or more tall people here, and you won't be the only new or prospective member! This is the place to start your social calendar planning, arrange carpooling for various events, and find out what's going on with all your Tall friends. If there's enough interest, we'll head into the restaurant around 8:00 PM to continue the conversation and get something to eat. Location: Marriott Hotel, 2345 Commonwealth Avenue (Rt. 30) in Newton Time: 6-8 PM, usually dinner afterwards to 10pm Cost: optional drinks Directions: Rt. 128 to exit 24 (Rt. 30). At the end of the ramp, go right. The Marriott is just ahead on your left. [url=http://marriott.com/property/propertypage/BOSNT]More on the Newton Marriott[/url]
item.how_to_find_us: Look for a group of tall people at the bar in the Riverbend or ask the bartender
item.name: The Boston Beanstalks Tall Club Monthly Meetup
